item.description:
On the heels of Christmas we are having a less intense weekend plan for 12/21 - 12/23
No big parties, no catered dinner.. just a quiet weekend at the Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club.

There are some things you should know:

If you can get up there on Friday 12/21
- Cranmore is offering a special lift ticket price of only $3.30 per lift ticket. It is literally a 5 minute drive from the Wedeln house!

- Settler's Green is only 15 min drive from the Wedeln house.
http://www.settlersgr...
There are over 60 outlets with tax free shopping in NH.
During the holidays, stores are open Friday & Saturday, 10am to 9pm; and Sundays 10am to 6pm...

- You can come back after a day of shopping and relax by our fireplace!

- With this weekend's snowstorm and cold weather expected during next week, there is plenty of skiing in the best early season conditions seen for a couple of years(8 -10 inches fell on Sunday 12/16) You can always cross-country ski in picturesque Jackson Village only 20 minutes away.


Food - There are plenty of restaurants in the area but if you would like to prepare your own food, there is a common Kitchen with 2 gas stoves and with large refrigerators / freezers to store food and beverages.

Amenities - Our Living room has a TV and a DVD player with a great fireplace! It was recently redecorated with new furniture and is very comfortable...

Guest Lodging Fee $20/pp/night payable on arrival via cash or check.

You must RSVP by Wednesday 12/19 9 PM.

To RSVP, please send an e-mail to 'membership@wedeln.com'. When you RSVP, please include your full name, cell phone number, and the names of your guest(s) and dates of arrival and departure.

Tom Lane will be your host for the weekend and a few others will be up at the house as well...

If you have any questions, please send them to 'membership@wedeln.com'

Regards,
Jonathan
Assistant Membership Chair
item.name: Need to get away! We invite you to Wedeln!
